m_szDocTitle: Rogers' (ROG) CEO Bruce Hoechner on Q1 2016 Results - Earnings Call Transcript | Seeking Alpha
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Rogers' (ROG) CEO Bruce Hoechner on Q1 2016 Results - Earnings Call Transcript May  3, 2016  2:53 PM ET | Q1 2016 Earnings Conference Call May 3, 2016, 9:00 am ET Executives William Tryon - Director, Investor & Public Relations Bruce Hoechner - President & CEO Janice Stipp - VP, Finance & CFO Bob Daigle - SVP & CTO Dana Walker - Kalmar Investments Operator Good morning. My name is Chris and I will be your conference operator today. At this time, I would like to welcome everyone to the Rogers Corporation 2016 First Quarter Conference Call. All lines have been pl
